author: geirm
msg: Added VM 'topic' section with answer to the question that was recently

author: geirm
msg: Simple class (with examples and data...) to show how to exploit Velocity's
'EL' (heh) to easily access XML data - in response to a post on the user
list - I dragged this out of jjar while I was making jjar JAXP compatible

author: geirm
msg: Well, I'm chagrined.  I was 100% convinced there was an issue with Ant 1.3's
version of JAXP such that this fix wouldn't be backwards compatible.
When I sat down, did thigns cleanly and carefully, all is well.
So this should work with Ant 1.3 and Ant 1.4 w/o problems.
